title-group.article-title: Force: Towards an Aesthetic Concept of Life

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 2010 The Johns Hopkins University Press

p.mixed-citation: Translated by Gerrit Jackson. -The second part of this essay is a revised and abridged version of chap. 3 of my Kraft. Ein Grundbegriff ästhetischer Anthropologie (Frankfurt am Main: Suhrkamp, 2008).
